tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Wouldn\'t take this class again. Not a good teacher. Doesn\'t tell you what\'s on your tests or manage his time well- he missed 3 classes and made us make up all the work and take tests (the only grades in the class) when no one was sure what would be on them. Interesting topic, would take with someone else

tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Very few tests, doesnt emphasize what you are expected to know. Only grades based on tests- experience papers from $10 mandatory concerts dont improve your grade. Class based on memorization-expect to memorize many names and songs that you will forget after. Makes a 100 level music appreciation class stressful and difficult-wouldnt take w him agai

tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  LOTS OF HOMEWORK  TOUGH GRADER
comments: A LOT of classical and opera. must attend classical concerts and write reviews on them. tests are medium length but kind of hard. Wish i would have dropped the class. He said the textbook was mandatory but we haven\'t used it yet.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Seriously one of the coolest professors at CofC. He makes the class a lot of fun. If you keep an open mind you will learn a lot about music and find some new favorite genres. The concert requirements are the only extra work really, and he\'ll direct you to the best shows in the city. Definitely knows his stuff.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Really great teacher! Super passionate about music! I recommend taking him!

tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: I really enjoyed this class, though it was sometimes boring. He was one of my only professors to allow me to use my computer to take notes, he does talk fast. No extra hw, just go to a few concerts! Tests weren\'t that difficult if you study, multiple choice, short answer, and listening. I only studied one night in advance and made As/Bs!

tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Absolutely wonderful. By far the best teacher at CofC\'s music department.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Apparently he can sing well, but he, quite incorrectly, thinks that makes him a decent teacher. Egomaniac. Embarrassment to the fine CofC Music Faculty.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: I had Templeton for music appreciation. He does a fine job teaching it and is a very fair man but is not that musically knowledgable. The class is way too much memorizing and not enough listening.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: I took Music Appreciation with him, and went into the class really excited for it. I love classical music, but have no training with musical instruments, and so thought I would be interested. I really tried to do well, and I didn\'t do badly, but the difficulty level was just ridiculous for Music Appreciation. He\'s a nice guy, but geez.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: I love him! Great guy, funny, talented and understands kids. Makes you want to do your best for him. He\'s fair and wants to show off the voice program to Charleston! Like singing? TAKE HIM!!

tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
